overview: Tony Kington brings more than 17 years of senior operational experience to Omni-ID from a wide variety of product-based sales and business development positions in the nuclear, print, chemical, and technology industries. As Omni-ID’s Managing Director, Europe-and “Executive in Residence” in the UK-Kington oversees the company’s global Supply Chain, which includes manufacturing, distribution, and customer service. He also manages Omni-ID’s major facility in the UK. Kington joined QinetiQ, Ltd. in 2004 to direct the initial development of the company’s RFID efforts, which led to the formation of Omni-ID. Previously, he worked in several capacities at BASF Printing Systems. He served simultaneously as General Manager and Sales and Marketing Director with a territory encompassing the UK and Ireland. As General Manager, Kington was responsible for manufacturing and worldwide distribution of BASF Printing Systems oil-based inks business, representing revenues of over $80 million globally. Kington also led Polestar Purnell, the UK’s largest publication printing facility, and part of the Polestar Group as Operations Director. In that role, Kington was responsible for order fulfillment and service levels, supplying more than 12 million finished products per week to newspapers, consumer magazines, direct mail, and catalogue sectors.
